title: The Pants All Of Bollywood Is Currently Wearing
text:
facebook 656 SHARES Just a few weeks ago we told you about Bollywood divas ditching their jeans because they’ve moved on to different versions of summer pants . Now, as far as we can see, these ladies seem to have picked the most dramatic, flouncy pants that we would like to call bell bottoms 2.0. This trend is only for brave hearts, so if you’re scared easy, you must stay away. Parisian fashion girls may say otherwise, but we fairly believe that these pants are nothing but a western twist on gararas . Because, with a fitted top half and a dramatic flare that starts right below the knee, if these don’t remind of the garara your second cousin wore to the last family wedding, you were probably really, really drunk. 
So here’s to the garara ’s NRI sister, the pants that Bollywood ladies are currently obsessing over. 1. Deepika’s all-black drama.
